name: The Wormhole
description:
You have been sucked into a wormhole and can't get out. Survive as long as possible.

This is a work in progress and is in need of further polish and content. I will be periodically posting updates until the game is complete. This is my first game and I would like to hear what you feel about it and what you'd like to see improve.

Comments and feedback would be greatly appreciated.

Current updates in progress:

Frame rate consistency

Settings menu

Story

Thanks for checking this out!
